website_summaries.verdict: An affordable eyebrow dye that produces long-lasting results for some users, especially those who prefer darker brows, but those who want lighter results should try another.
pros: Has a thick gel consistency that is easy to mix and only takes minutes to process
Can be used on brows and lashes
cons: Color has the tendency to be darker than expected
Some reports of skin irritation following use
Awkward to apply with the comb that comes with it

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! I'm a redhead so my eyelashes are a mix of clear and red and I wanted to use this because I like the look of mascara but workout and fight wildfires a lot so I had to wear waterproof but hated the work of taking it off. Don't use the included tools though I used my eyeliner brush. I did it twice to get the eyelashes I didn't get the first time but probably only need to do it once in the future now that I understand. Definitely plenty of product for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: A lovely brown
customer_reviews.text: I like this product to darken my long but very pale lashes - I like not having to wear mascara to make my lashes visible! And most mascara is much too black and overpowering. This brown is lovely and looks natural - without effort, for weeks. I've gotten pretty good applying this, but I first use a thick gentle moisturizer on nearby skin so any excess wipes right off. Also, I use separate mascara wands to apply the two liquids [not a q-tip and comb as the directions suggest]. Works with no mess for me. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Results. Painful Process.
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure: I have lupus with Sjogren's Syndrome. My body does not make enough tears, so my results with this product may not be typical (I don't know). However, this product stung like the dickens. I love the results. My eyelashes and brows are a soft, light brown instead of blonde. And it's super easy to use. And the stinging went away. But ouch. Five Stars for the result. One Star for the pain.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and it lasts for 4-6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and it lasts for 4-6 weeks. If you smudged the skin just wipe it with a cotton swab dipped in mild soap immediately. It comes right off. I work in a high end spa and our esthetician could not believe I did it myself! She complimented the natural looking color of my brows :)
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I will order it again when I run out. One of the most important things to know is that the longer you leave on the step one product, the darker your hair will get when you put on the second product. Also, if you do get it on any part of your body, get as much off as you can as soon as you can with a wet towel or washcloth because it does not come off, you wait for it to wear off. Every time I use it I get better at it. It's a good product. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Crider

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this. I don't know if the formula is changed or what. You apply it and it is supposed to last for weeks. Every time I use it my it washes or fades off in a couple days!! That defeats the purpose of a dye. Sometimes the color has a hard time 'taking' I notice. I used this brand years ago with much better results. It is rather a waste of money now. Since the color doesn't stay for more than a few days it's an expensive hassle. You might as will just use regular eyebrow pencil, etc...
customer_reviews.author: countrylady

customer_reviews.title: Looks Black
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my white eyebrows. It came out black. It is difficult because it stains everything and you have to really be good at getting it just on the area you want it. If you get it on your skin it will be there for days even if you use hair color remover. It you get it on your sink you have to sand it off. I just don't like paying a professional $20 just to do my eyebrows. I thought this would be an actual brown because I have the black one and I felt it was too dark but this came out exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Eyebrow darkening for us older gentlemen is a secret key to looking young. Fuller, darker eyebrow's will help you keep your job in Silicon valley
customer_reviews.author: T. Dubbs

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to apply
customer_reviews.text: It's VERY difficult to get the product on lashes without getting it on the skin. A little on the skin would be fine if I were to cover it up with eyeliner. But I'm wanting to go makeup free. Also, the applicator comb is just silly. I used a disposable mascara wand, but even still, the product is a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertized. You should be very careful while applying it because the color sticks to the skin immediately and you won't be able to get rid of it until it washes ouf in a week or so. The color is dark, almost black. I use it for my lashes and brows and need to refresh it every 2-3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Prelle

customer_reviews.title: Reapply for subtle changes
customer_reviews.text: I have brown eyelashes and eyebrows, but I thought I would give this a try to fill out those occasional blonde tips. I didn't use the under-eye paper shields. I just applied thick lotion under my eyes. This was incredibly easy to apply, but since it can cause irritation, you can only leave it on one minute at a time. This is why several applications may be necessary. Since the tips of my brown eyelashes are lighter than the bases, this has made my lashes appear longer. My eyebrows look a little fuller, too. Not a huge difference, but it does make my eyes seem bolder. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Beecaves

customer_reviews.title: Please read reviews
customer_reviews.text: I have been dying my lashes and brows for years thought I would try this brand. Color didn’t transfer to lashes or brows just made big mess
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Nice natural lashes
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice dark brown color, perfect for natural, dark eyelashes for redheads or blondes.
customer_reviews.author: Student

customer_reviews.title: I wish
customer_reviews.text: Not too shabby. Wish I just had darker hair and not clear eyelashes and brows LOL
customer_reviews.author: RNW

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: I tried this tonight with the brown. i have light brown eyelashes. I used the new one that you dissolve the vit. c tablet first into the botle. I was very disappointed. My top lashes are marginally darker than they were before and the bottom lashes didn't take at all. I did each eye twice. Not really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: The Samsungs

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves! However...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter (with very sensitive skin) who has been begging me to dye her lashes for years. While the dye showed great results that she was very happy with, I noticed her skin started to break out into red blotches. While she said they didn’t hurt at all and didn’t seem bothered, I was still a bit worried. Went away in about 15 mins though!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hartigan

customer_reviews.title: Not Super Impressed for Brows
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this dye for my eyebrows. Unfortunately, I was very disappointed. Not only was it way darker than I expected, but it didn’t take to all my lashes so it ended up looking patchy. It wasn’t a good fit for me personally, and I will not be purchasing for my eyebrows again. Maybe it does better for lashes??
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie E.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this product. Having to put the clear gel on first is a pain. Then can’t see where you are putting the dye because it also clear. I have extremely light eyelashes, pretty much translucent, and the brown was not dark enough to really notice the difference. A waste of time and money. 1,000 hour is a much better product!
customer_reviews.author: C. Roy

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! it doesn't last as long as they say it will but the color is amazing for the first 10-14 days. Not too dark. Super easy application. I'm too afraid to use it on lashes, but that is just me.
customer_reviews.author: Roamin' Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to the letter and read many reviews prior in order to apply this in the best possible way. I did only one eye so I could compare. I watched the gel turn black on my lashes and then as soon as I removed it I discovered their color had not changed at all. None of the dye stayed. The dyed lashes look exactly the same as the undyed ones. Complete waste of time and money. Might be a fake product sent to me Considering Amazon's issue with these. Or maybe it is really a worthless product. Either way, don't bother buying this from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lawver

customer_reviews.title: Good for quick brows
customer_reviews.text: I used this to dye my Eyebrows, I left the liquid on for 40 seconds and then I put on the gel, DO NOT get this gel on your skin! It stains immediately, I was able to get almost all of it off with misceller water and very hard scrubbing. If you are careful to only get the gel on your brow or eyelash hairs, then this works perfectly and super quick! I will update this review with how long it lasts for.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Really was a pain to use......poor results............color lasted less than 3 days. I have very blonde eyelashes......didn't order black thought it would be too harsh. Don't waste your time and money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Strong

customer_reviews.title: Easiest, nicest product on the market that I have found.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use this product. I applied it as soon as I opened the package to my eyebrows, which have thinned and grayed with age, and... Perfect! Instant results and easy . This will always be my favorite. Very worth the money. My eyebrows look better now ,then they did when I was in my 30's..
customer_reviews.author: Rose Josh

customer_reviews.title: Im in love
customer_reviews.text: For someone that has blonde eyebrows that are hard to see this product is great my eye brows have never looked so good! Easy to apply and doesn't take long at all
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: An overall great product! Easy to use, the color lasts for fairly long (I usually dye my brows once a month) and it can be adjusted based on how long you leave it on. Been using this product for two years now after trying two other brands, this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: ugh frustrating
customer_reviews.text: This was SO difficult to use. It stung my eyes, even though it was only being applied NEAR them! ugh, what a mess, even though I prepared as much as humanly possible.... using everyone's suggestions. If you can gamble 8.50 or whatever, go ahead. I ended up trying to scrub off way more than I got applied!
customer_reviews.author: rearview1

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The process isn’t that hard, but the comb being the only tool provided is difficult. I tried using this product multiple times & multiple ways, but the dye would not last longer than 2-3 days for my eyebrows. The dye barely made my eyelashes darker as well. I was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: isabellacal

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: There are better kits. This one has clumsy tools. The dye didn’t even do much. Did not tint skin where missing hair is either. That’s what I wanted it for. My brow hair felt coarser after I did it. Would have returned but just throwing out.
customer_reviews.author: An amazon junky

customer_reviews.title: Very good. Easier to apply than TIntocil. Hard to predict color. Works fast.
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Easier to apply than TIntocil. Hard to predict color. Works fast once the color is applied!
customer_reviews.author: Verbatim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use -no fuss or muss
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and has little to no red tint which is great - easy application -I have ordered again and will continue to do so -Thank you
customer_reviews.author: christine baker

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't highly impressed.
customer_reviews.text: It was somewhat messy to use and did not cover the gray eyebrow hairs.
customer_reviews.author: ray hanus

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to apply and does not look natural. Also, it really irritated my eye area.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. L Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Covers gray well
customer_reviews.text: Works great and no messy mixing. I used it for my eyebrows and found it easier to apply with a spoolie brush rather than the comb provided.
customer_reviews.author: Vessie310

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use. I will order darker color next time but this one works just fine. In a few minutes I had my eyelashes and eyebrows done, safe at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jolanta Menert

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have very blonde hair and my eyebrows are white. This dye works magic so I don't have to fill in my eyebrows every day! So easy to use I do it myself every time and people ask " did you get your eyebrows done? Looks great" what they don't know is I do it myself 😊
customer_reviews.author: Annika Manning

customer_reviews.title: good product, you just have to experiment
customer_reviews.text: The problem is if you want a light brown you should only leave the developer (stage 1) on for about a minute.... although if you have stubborn grays then you should apply the developer (stage 1) more then once and leave it for about 2 mins but then the color becomes too dark. But the color does stay for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: matrix058

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Definitely different than expected I thought a brow tint but no just does hairs a bit
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought again for the wife and she likes it, but for her it last about 30-40 days and she is using it again
customer_reviews.author: Old Bob

customer_reviews.title: no change noted
customer_reviews.text: Does not work, I turned to an over the counter hair dye for under $4 & works for weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Robeck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I am totally happy with this product, I find it easy to use. Take your time to read instructions and do a proper set up. Start with just one side, to begin with leave it on for 1 minute. Be careful since the skin will easily be stained as well. It is a beautiful dark brown, no red in it, perfect fit to my blonde hair. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: fritz

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use...didn’t color my brows or lashes, maybe a touch, I tried ten minutes the first time, twenty the second and a half hour the third...all on different weeks. Wasn’t impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest product I have ever tried! So far holding up for 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Gosia

customer_reviews.title: The worst eyelash/brow coloring product I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: The worst eyelash/brow coloring product I have ever had. I gave it a try two times and threw it away after the second use. The color was uneven and penetrated the skin too deep without coloring brow hair. I would end up with stained skin and still light eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Burr

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: I have very light eyelashes and this stuff at least makes the lashes show up. I still have to wear mascara. I can't seem to get this stuff on my lower lashes at all.
customer_reviews.author: klemm

customer_reviews.title: Ordered se ond bottle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to darken my eyebrows as they are blondish and needed some definition. The product is a little difficult to use and requires a steady hand. Overall I am fairly pleased with the product and just ordered a second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great for my brows
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to brow dye for years. The color is perfect for me and it lasts 4-5 wks. Just wish I could get it to work on my lashes as well, but no matter what I do they won't hold any color.
customer_reviews.author: calidawglvr

customer_reviews.title: Darker than expected
customer_reviews.text: Goes on a little darker than expected and leaves lines on skin that come off after couple days. Overall easy to use. Needs to be reapplied once a month or so. I'm happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I wish this product would last a bit longer on my eyebrows. It’s very good and easy to use but lasts only about a week in my case. So I apply it once a week. The packaging lasts for a long time. That said I have not come across a better product than this and I have tried a few.
customer_reviews.author: DomDem

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: My new go to for tint coloring but it takes some practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Other make up will do a better job at less expense.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Gentry

customer_reviews.title: It works and it’s super easy
customer_reviews.text: I typically get my eyebrows tinted from my wax lady but due to Covid-19 I had to take matters into my own hands and all I gotta say for how cheap and easy this was to apply I will not be going back to my eyebrow lady, sorry jess 😅😬
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Schriefer

customer_reviews.title: I've used other brands and this one is the best
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my brows which at my age are not as dark as they once were and also there are random white hairs that I don't want to pull out. The white hairs cover nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Boots Evans

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just didn't work. Tried several times. Have one spot on my fingernail that will not come off...but wouldn't color my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Lentz

customer_reviews.title: This product is not what it used to be!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved Swiss o par and was very happy with the results before. Unfortunately the new vitamin c solution does not work well and the color is barely visible. Very disappointed ! Would like to see the old formula return and would buy again when available.
customer_reviews.author: Carole L.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Really like the ease of application- good color saturation- must wait and see for the longevity
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M. Bohan

customer_reviews.title: Good for brows
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for eyebrows. Trickier & didn't make a big difference on lashes. Love that it's cruelty free & pretty natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: Green Naturally

customer_reviews.title: This product BURNS so bad! I took it off right away and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of different coloring kit (eyebrows, eyelashes and hair) and I've never had any problems before. This product BURNS so bad! I took it off right away and it had stained my skin even when I had used Vaseline around my eyebrows. I do not recommend this product sorry
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Schiller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to tint lashes and brows at home
customer_reviews.text: Great product, results better than at salon, easy to use, clean and not clumpy consistency
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Once you figure out the included comb is useless and application has to be very thorough and even ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s Ok. Once you figure out the included comb is useless and application has to be very thorough and even or you get crazy, patchy results ... the brown, though, is very ashy brown — greyish. Not a warm reddish brown. Just fyi. It does not go well with my auburn hair.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After I applied, I saw no difference from my normal lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As expected, the second step is where you see the color change. Will use again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci

customer_reviews.title: I just got this, applied it to my lashes ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this, applied it to my lashes and about 3 minutes later nothing had changed, have you know I have blonde eyelashes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and easy to use. Once you do it a couple of times you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not order, expecting the same
customer_reviews.text: Do not order this product, it is not the same as you ordered before.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Harden

customer_reviews.title: Powerfully Perfect Eyebrows For Weeks
customer_reviews.text: Lasts along time. Makes nice dark eyebrows. If you want them lighter test the application time. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Embee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, works quickly, lasts. My daughter, who is blond, found it a bit too dark (I thought her eyebrows looked great); I'm brunette and found it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: E. Goodling

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color barely shows up. Still needed mascara so it wasn't very helpful, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Followed directions exactly and nothing. Eyelashes are still blonde.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie Edmonson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: will badly stain whatever it touches took 2 wks to get it off of my hand. terrible product!
customer_reviews.author: Patsy P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Safe, effective and very easy to use. LOVE it. I use the brown on brows and black on eyelashes. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: The worst dye I have ever used. I am dyeing my eye lashes for long time .I even can not do return because box was open.
customer_reviews.author: Gennady K.

customer_reviews.title: I studied the instructions and am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I studied the instructions and am glad I did--The result was attractive eyebrows! My hair color is light and the result was a definite dark brown. I would have tried a lighter color as would a co-worker if it were available.
customer_reviews.author: carol braley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just be careful if you use on lashes as it can be irritating during the process
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to apply , with lashes had to apply a couple of times for it to show
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and really lasts! No more eyebrow pencil! It looks really dark when you put in on, don't freak, just have a wet wipe ready.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the first half of the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the first half of the bottle. Last a longer than any other brow dye I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: julia bozarth

customer_reviews.title: Worth it every time
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product - I wish it were available in retail stores here in Canada; always gives me a perfect natural looking result
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to avoid ending up with jet black eyebrows ...
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to avoid ending up with jet black eyebrows when using this product. Also very difficult to obtain evenly distributed color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's so easy to use!! I will order more when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it came in a lighter brown. I like the fact that it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not cover the gray.
customer_reviews.text: It did not cover the gray hairs in my eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Champ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I have blonde eye lashes and eye brows
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have blonde eye lashes and eye brows. This dye works so well, and it's not very difficult to apply. It can also be used any times.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product to cover greying eyebrows - I have used it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: nelly BAERS-BRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Wore off within a week
customer_reviews.text: Put this on my mom and boy did it make her eyes pop! It has a great color and easy application (which you can use many time) but it did wear off after about a week. We were fine with it because of the many applications.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have found it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I have only used it on my brows so far, but the color is great, it was easy to apply and no irritation!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: The dye does the trick, but the brush is probably not the most convenient thing for applying it. Overall, I would buy it again, but I'll be looking out for some alternatives for the brush.
customer_reviews.author: quibbler

customer_reviews.title: All round great product from color to application
customer_reviews.text: All round great product from color to application. Be careful not to get the product on skin and under finger nails as it stains very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to dye my eyebrows. It works well and needs to be reapplied every two - three weeks because brow hairs continue to grow and fall out. My only complaint is that this dye doesn't work on the gray hairs in my brows very well unless it reapply it several times. Otherwise, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: BC Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its ok but not as easy to apply . Also results not really what you'd expect from a tint.
customer_reviews.author: Rozy

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to dye my grey eyebrows. It didn't take very long and they are still dark three weeks later. I wish they made a much lighter brown as this color is very dark brown. I would need light brown as my hair is blonde.
customer_reviews.author: Azgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it ... I will be buying some more soon
customer_reviews.author: sandy k shifflett

customer_reviews.title: NOT right for me
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me: I did not feel comfortable with the fact that the dye stains instantly anywhere it touches. I know women who like it but I had to throw it out ( waste of money for me) when I wrote to the co after first trying, they wrote that Amazon states that you can never return items of this sort. So I tried again I went back to my older Universal product very happily. I think I was seduced by the "Swiss" name thinking it would be "pure" It is not very pure Not for me
customer_reviews.author: Jungianscientist

customer_reviews.title: The gel was not easy to apply with the comb so I used a ...
customer_reviews.text: The gel was not easy to apply with the comb so I used a toothpick with cotton wound on it. That worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product but only leave on really short time if your brows are light color
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product, the color doesn't even hold for a day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product i have been using it for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product i have been using it for a while and realized I never gave it a review. The results worked so well for me, and have made such a difference, especially in my brows. The eyelash/brow applier brush isnt the best but using a washed mascara brush works just fine. I put tape around my brows to protect the dye from getting on my skin (although the dye only stays on skin for a couple days.) but all in all this product has made my brows darker and has impressed me considering it was so cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Apple Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I have very light eyebrows and eyelashes. I did my eyebrows first. Left step 1 on for a minute and then applied the gel. Turned my eyebrows black!!! I looked ridiculous with my reddish brown hair and dark black eyebrows. For some reason I decided to continue on to my eyelashes. I had the complete opposite problem; the dye did absolutely nothing for my eyelashes! So there I was... reddish brown hair, dark black eyebrows, and blonde eyelashes. What a mess. Never ever again. I’ll stick to filling in my eyebrows and using mascara every day. (Thankfully the eyebrows faded to a lighter shade within a few days)
customer_reviews.author: chrisseeg

customer_reviews.title: an oldie but goodie - easy, and it lasts
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and easy to use, whole process takes 10 minutes if that. I use for eyebrows, that have lightened over time (although my hair is still medium brown). Two step process, generously apply liquid to eyebrow hairs with Qtip , then comb on the gel (little brow comb provided in kit), wash off, viola! And it lasts a good month-to-5-weeks.
customer_reviews.author: RL_DJ

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the color brown. It turned black. The comb is only good for the lashes and it globs up. It is hard to work with because it works so fast. I didn't see any difference to my lashes but my brows turned black, not the color I was going for. I went to UTube for instructions because the print is very small on the instructions. I would not purchase this product again and will probably not use it again. I'll throw it out. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Danna L. Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Actually the photos of one of the reviewers were very helpful. Instructions do not have any. It is easy to use, takes just few minutes. I used it twice so far on my brow only. I think it lasted about 4 weeks. The color of brown is actually almost black. It stays on the skin as well so if you do not immediately clean it well from the skin you will see the final effect within 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Practical G.

product_meta.title: Swiss O Par Eyelash and Brow Dye Tint Color Kit (Brown)
product_meta.description:
The colour lasts for several weeks. Content for up to 10 uses, depending on amount of hair. 

Contents: 1 bottle with 5 ml liquid, 1 tube 5 ml colour gel, 1 colour comb, 2 cotton buds, 10 eyelash pads, 1 detailed instructions leaflet 

The colour gel contains silver nitrate: If it comes into contact with your eyes, rinse immediately with water.Simply apply the liquid to your eyelashes with the supplied cotton buds and wait one minute. Apply the colour gel with the comb supplied and wash off any excess gel immediately. Please follow the instructions supplied in the packet.
feature_bullets: Swiss-O-Par Eyebrow and Eyelash Colour Brown
